featured.text: It would take 10 people holding hands to surround the base of its trunk.

other.text: They have heavy and straight tree trunks.

definition.zh_def: 樹幹；行李箱；大塊的物體或容器
definition.en_def: The main stem of a tree or a large container for carrying items.
definition.example: The elephant's trunk is used for drinking and picking up objects.
